headline: Old Dominion Freight Line to Webcast First Quarter 2025 Conference Call
summary: THOMASVILLE, N.C., March 26, 2025--Old Dominion Freight Line, Inc. (Nasdaq: ODFL) announced today that it plans to release its first quarter 2025 financial results before opening of trading on Wednesday, April 23, 2025. The Company will also hold a conference call to discuss its financial results and outlook at 10:00 a.m. (Eastern Time) on Wednesday, April 23, 2025.

headline: Ward Transport hires TForce Freight sales leader
summary: Brian Goley, former TForce regional sales director, is now western division sales director at Ward.
